verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You won’t relent until you have it all My heart is yours Repeat 4x{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I’ll set you as a seal upon my heart For there is love, that is as strong as death Jealousy demanding as the grave And many waters, cannot quench this love{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Come be the fire inside of me Come be flame upon my heart Until You and I are one{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}[Bridge] I don’t wanna talk about you, like you’re not in the room I wanna look right at you I wanna sing right to you (Repeat){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}[Bridge 2] There’s nothing we want more (than You, Jesus) Repeat{/lang-eng}
